programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Paradiso
programme.desc: Rafael é o projecionista do último cinema de filmes pornográficos de Madrid. Está convicto de que todos os dias pode fazer um melhor trabalho.

programme.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: Episódios 5-6
programme.desc: Match Point | Noite Europeia

programme.title: Made in Senegal
programme.desc: Made in Senegal é uma história sobre vontade, sonhos, determinação, fé, rebelião, coragem e amor. O filme convida-nos a uma jornada pelos diferentes mundos e altamente variados de Sadio - desde a vida rural numa pequena aldeia no extremo sul de Senegal até aos holofotes do futebol mundial jogando pelo Liverpool FC, vencendo as Ligas dos Campeões como número 10 e ganhando a audiência mundial. A Interação de animações, cenas de documentário, um conjunto diversificado de imagens detalhadas e de arquivo dá vida ao passado de Sadio e cria um excitante enredo cheio de emoções.

programme.title: Os Segredos de La Roja – Campeões do Mundo 2010
programme.desc: No dia 11 de julho de 2010, a equipa nacional de Espanha alcançou o seu objetivo de vencer a Copa do Mundo, uma vitória que foi sentida pela equipa e pelo país como um todo. Apesar desse final bem-sucedido, “La Roja” teve que superar várias lutas e dificuldades para se tornar lendário. A equipa chegou à África do Sul com o triunfo do Campeonato Europeu de Futebol de 2008 e Vicente del Bosque a liderar o trajeto. Havia um sentimento geral de favoritismo atribuído a ""La Roja"" e, embora a derrota contra a Suíça no primeiro jogo tenha sido chocante, motivou Del Bosque e a sua equipa a unirem-se e a concentrarem-se com uma única intenção: bom futebol; e um objetivo: fazer história.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Give Up Tomorrow
programme.desc: Nas Filipinas, um homem inocente enfrenta a pena de morte num polêmico caso de assassinato que separou duas famílias e uma nação inteira.

programme.title: 265 Days Without Waves (265 dias sem ondas)
programme.desc: Uma história única e extraordinária sobre a criação por um grupo de surfistas locais de uma comunidade e cultura de surf apesar das limitações, numa costa que mal chega aos 100 dias de ondas por ano. Através das personagens, exploramos a evolução do surf bem como a exponencial mudança socioeconómica de Barcelona e arredores, da década de 1960 até à atualidade. Entre os protagonistas aventureiros e dedicados, conhecemos os pioneiros que nadaram contra a maré e a nova geração que vive e respira o surf de uma forma completamente diferente. Frustração, espera e desespero combinam-se em igual medida com entusiasmo, perseverança e humor.

programme.title: The Australian Dream (2019)
programme.desc: O Australian Dream é um documentário que utiliza a notável e inspiradora história do legendário aborígene da AFL Adam Goodes como o prisma para contar uma história mais profunda e poderosa sobre raça, identidade e pertença. O filme irá descompactar os eventos das temporadas da AFL 2013-15 e fará perguntas fundamentais sobre a natureza do racismo e da discriminação na sociedade atual. O escritor premiado de Walkley, Stan Grant, e o premiado diretor do BAFTA, Daniel Gordon, unem forças para contar essa história notável de um dos jogadores mais condecorados e célebres da história da AFL.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Wendie Renard, vencedora da UEFA em sete ocasiões e Jogadora do Ano de 2018 da FIFA, aguarda a chegada de Annie Fortems, uma pioneira do futebol feminino francês, e Sonia Ouchene, uma jovem e promissora jogadora do Stade de Reims, no estádio Olympique Lyonnais. Wendie recorda o início da sua carreira, as suas vitórias e momentos difíceis, como os ataques racistas que sofreu. Annie discorre sobre como a sua geração tornou o futebol feminino francês possível, apesar das ameaças de morte recebidas, enquanto Sonia fala sem rodeios sobre a disparidade salarial entre o futebol feminino e masculino. O encontro das três jogadoras será marcado pela admiração mútua.

programme.title: Bojan, por trás do sorriso
programme.desc: Depois de retirar-se dos relvados aos 32 anos, Bojan Krkic decide contar a sua história. Através de uma conversa com o psicanalista que o tratou quando da sua estreia com o FC Barcelona aos 16 anos, o documentário explora as dificuldades enfrentadas por um talento precoce e sensível no mundo cruel do futebol. Jogadores que testemunharam a sua carreira de perto, tais como Thierry Henry, Andrés Iniesta e Zlatan Ibrahimovic, partilham o seu ponto de vista sobre Bojan, o futebolista, e Bojan, a pessoa, e refletem sobre a pressão, saúde mental e gestão de expetativas.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 5-6
programme.desc: Episódio 5 - La Palma | Episódio 6 - El Hierro and La Gomera

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: Learn Colors with Shape Block and more
programme.desc: Let's learn colors with Shape Blocks and Wonderville Friends!

programme.title: Baby Shark Toy Song
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Baby Shark Toy Song
programme.desc: Have joyful learning and singing with Baby Shark and the Shark Family toy!

programme.title: Peekaboo! Baby Shark Babysits
programme.desc: "Baby Shark Babysits Baby Baby Shark! You're watching ""Peekaboo! Baby Shark Babysits in the Amusement Park"", a super fun story for kids to learn!"

programme.title: Mischievous Thief Baby Shark
programme.desc: Oh, do you know Thief Baby Shark? His name is Lucky chucky Chuck! Let's sing along with Cute Baby Shark and Mischievous Thief Chuck!

programme.desc: Our 1972 Camaro is ready for reassembly. The roll cage is welded up, so now it's time to reattach the roof. We'll show you some helpful techniques on how to reinstall your cut-off top. Plus, we head out to help a young viewer get his '91 Chevy Camaro back on the road in an all-new Driveway Rescue.

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: Step by step, we install a new top on our 1966 Pontiac convertible. Plus, a High Performance visit to Las Vegas for LS Fest West.

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: We just can't stop searching for more power from our Small Block Chevy! It's getting high-octane race fuel, more aggressive timing, and a bigger cam.

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Our 2011 Diesel Denali nicknamed "Dragonali" gets lowered & de-badged, plus we're in a viewers' driveway rescuing their beat up pick-up.

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: We upgrade the brakes, repair underside problems, and put some great new off-road and recovery mods on our 2007 Jeep Wrangler JK. Then we'll take it out for a wheeling adventure.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Quebec, Canada
programme.desc: Aux Anciens Canadiens in Quebec is known for its Deer meat pie so Alex starts with trying it and then tastes of chocolates. He later introduces Rue Du Tresor street and later he is seen on Quartier Petit Champlain street. Wrapping up, he visits Parc de la chute-Montmorency waterfalls where tourists enjoy photography, cable-car ride and walk on a suspended bridge between cliffs.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: In her final leg of the journey Sabrina uncover the mysteries of the ancient temples of Luxor, Aswan and Abu Simbel paired with the Monastery of Catherine atop Mt. Sinai.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: In the Troodos ranges of Cyprus, Sabrina Chakici visits the Kykkos Monastery and the ten small village churches, which have become a UNESCO World Heritage Site. She further ventures out to explore the Neolithic village of Khirokitia and learn about the age-old lace tradition in Lefkara village.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 City Breaks Bukhara, Uzbekistan
programme.desc: One of Uzbekistan’s most ancient cities, Bukhara was a popular town even during the days of the Silk Route trading. Built atop a constellation of small oases here weary desert travelers could find water and rest. Through its madrassahs, minarets, a massive royal fortress and the remnants of a once-vast market complex, Alex Outhwaite soaks in the vibes of the Central Asia of yore.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Food Fact Fun Toronto, Canada
programme.desc: Vietnamese sandwich shop is Alex’s first stop in Toronto where he tries the Kimchi fries. Further explores the Market 707 for some asian food shops. Next he visits the Casa Loma castle and then Sir Henry’s garage for classic cars and finally explores and interacts with shopkeepers in Saint Lauren’s Market. Next, Alex in Ontario exploring the place on Segway. For some adventure, he then tries Skydiving at iFLY and to end his day with paddle boating.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici marvels at the architectural wonders of Baku, the capital of Azerbaijan, while also checking out souvenirs at the local bazaar.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: Lying next to the island's beautiful Mediterranean coastline, in south-western Cyprus, the popular town of Paphos is home to some spectacular archaeological attractions and a rich Cypriot history. Here, Sabrina discovers the myths of the Greek and Roman philosophies, unravels the stories hidden in time at Paphos Archaeological Park, and explores the historic towns of Limassol and Kourion.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Food Fact Fun Niagara, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts in Niagara with a 5 course meal along with enjoying dance performances near the Niagara falls. Next, exploring the urban space, he visits the Skylon town for a stunning view of the city. Further he visits the Niagara-on-the-lake village and explores its surroundings. He then interacts with a wine expert to learn more about the regional wines. Lastly, Alex is seen exploring the Niagara falls by helicopter, the a tunnel that takes him to the observation desk and then by ferry.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Azerbaijan has many natural wonders, which could amaze a traveler. From physical mud volcanoes to striking rock formations, Sabrina Chakici witnesses a few of them at Gobustan National Park. Following this, she reaches the city of Ganja, where she uncovers the history at spectacular places such as Heyder Aliyev Park, Mausoleum Imamzadeh, Juma Mosque and Mausoleum Nizami.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Food Fact Fun Vancouver, Canada
programme.desc: Alex starts his Vancouver exploration by visiting Bridges restaurant where he tries smoked salmon pizza with some seafood. Then he visits the Richmond Night Market and then Treasure Cafe. Later visits the Steel Toad Brewery in Olympic Village. Next he explores the Gastown, including the steam clock. Further he explores the Hills Native Art ending with Vancouver observation deck. Next he rides on board the Grouse Mountain Skyride, ending with Capilano Suspension Bridge park.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: In her final leg of the journey Sabrina uncover the mysteries of the ancient temples of Luxor, Aswan and Abu Simbel paired with the Monastery of Catherine atop Mt. Sinai.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Tallinn, Estonia’s capital, is known for its quaint, medieval Old Town but Italian nomad couple, Marco and Erica discover other sides to the city by visiting offbeat attractions such as the Seaplane Harbour Museum and Telliskivi Creative City, a hub of artists. They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

They also tuck into a medieval feast at Olde Hansa Inn. Following this, they have an off-roading adventure at Aidu oil shale quarry.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boarding Pass Helsinki, Finland
programme.desc: Renowned journalist and traveler, Emeline Nsingi Nkosi visits the colourful, clean and minimalist seaside city of Helsinki, the capital of Finland. Here, she explores the iconic attractions, right from magnificent historical fortresses and monuments to churches and libraries with groundbreaking design. She finds out that Helsinki offers a fascinating journey through centuries of evolving architecture and style. She also pampers herself at a Finnish sauna.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Levi offers all the excitement and comforts for a truly memorable holiday in Lapland’s wilderness. It is, however, the local ways of life that attract Emeline Nsingi Nkosi, as she joins the residents of Levi in foraging, cooking and eating, and learns from them about Sisu - the Finnish secret to happiness. Following this, she goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder, who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer in Finland.

programme.title: Bucket List
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Bucket List Aso, Japan
programme.desc: Daniel Coll & Paddy Doherty try some adventurous activities at Mount Aso, the caldera that is home to Japan’s most active volcano.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: There is no better place to feel ‘duende’, the spirit and passion of Spain than its lively capital, Madrid. Alex catches some of the city’s infectious liveliness at its bustling squares such as Puerto del Sol and Plaza Mayor. She experiences the Spaniards’ love for food as she tucks into authentic Spanish churros. She also finds out about the city’s rich and complex history at places such as Cathedral de la Almudena and Madrid’s Royal Palace.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 City Breaks Jaipur, India
programme.desc: A quick escape to Jaipur introduces Asmita to the stark contrast in the old and new sides of Rajasthan’s capital city. On the one hand, she has a tryst with the global cosmopolis that attracts business and luxury travelers from all over the world. On the other hand, the regal monuments of the region reveal to her the stories of the kings who built them.

programme.title: 10 Days Cyprus
programme.desc: From being the primary mode of transport for many centuries to helping in the production of olive oil, the donkeys in Cyprus have truly earned the status of the national animal. Our host, Sabrina Chakici finds out more about them and their significance to the country when she visits a donkey farm. She also visits Akamas Peninsula National Park, one of the island country’s last remaining wildernesses.

programme.desc: A lifetime project completed in 44 seconds. On September 4, 2021, Italian pilot Dario Costa attempted to fly his race plane at 303,8kph through Turkey’s dual Çatalca Tunnels.

programme.desc: The team behind the Red Bull Stratos mission battles mechanical failures, hostile weather, and internal demons to make Felix Baumgartner's historic jump possible.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.desc: After a breakthrough comp season in 2021, Natalia Grossman became the first American in 20 years to be the IFSC Climbing World Cup champion. Now, she's in the unfamiliar position of having to defend her title.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 Burning the flame part 1
programme.desc: Big wall free climbing masters Babsi and Jacopo seek their greatest challenge yet: a free ascent of Eternal Flame, an elusive 3,000ft (914km). route up the legendary Nameless Tower in Pakistan.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 Burning the flame part 2
programme.desc: With a fleeting weather window and the season coming to a close, Babsi Zangerl and Jacopo Larcher must conquer countless hard pitches in freezing temps to finish what they started.

programme.title: Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 1 Greece
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 1 Greece
programme.desc: The iconic Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series is back for its 15th season, returning to where it all began - Athens, Greece, the site of the inaugural finale event in 2009.

programme.title: Red Bull Cliff Diving stop #2 Boston
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Cliff Diving stop #2 Boston
programme.desc: The World Series returns to the sports-crazed city of Boston and the platform atop the Institute of Contemporary Art for a 3rd year. The best cliff divers in the world dive from heights up to 90 feet.

programme.title: Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 3 Italy
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 3 Italy
programme.desc: The Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series is back in Polignano a Mare, Italy, for the 13th time, featuring breathtaking dives from stunning cliffs into the blue waters below.

programme.title: Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 4 Northern Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Cliff Diving - Stop 4 Northern Ireland
programme.desc: The ultimate cliff diving event took place as Northern Ireland welcomed the world's top divers to a challenging location with three distinct dive spots, testing their skills and courage.

programme.title: Bang on Time
programme.desc: Freeskiers and wingsuit pilots come together in a world premiere. As skiers perform tricks, they’ll be accompanied by the Red Bull Skydive Team performing an airborne spin-and-flip at the same time.

programme.title: Mission to the Edge of Space
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mission to the Edge of Space
programme.desc: The team behind the Red Bull Stratos mission battles mechanical failures, hostile weather, and internal demons to make Felix Baumgartner's historic jump possible.

programme.title: Don't Look Down
programme.desc: 2,000ft in the air. Sub-zero temperatures. Who said you can't ride a BMX park in the sky? This is how Kriss Kyle's daring idea grew into a mind-boggling feat of aeronautical engineering and BMX-riding skill.

programme.title: Shires
programme.desc: Filmed over two years and narrated by Rob Warner, Shires is a bicycle film encompassing everything that makes UK riding great – the riders, trails, landscapes and the volatile weather of the British isles.

programme.title: Jorge Prado: Under the Lights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jorge Prado: Under the Lights
programme.desc: 23-year-old Jorge Prado stands atop European motocross as reigning MXGP World Champion. Now he's chasing a lifelong dream and testing himself by racing Supercross under the bright lights in America.

programme.title: The Old World
programme.desc: Bridging the gap between mountain biking and BMX, The Old World shines a spotlight on the European riders dominating the world stage, from the rough the fjords of Norway to the Scottish Highlands.

programme.title: Tunnel Pass
programme.desc: A lifetime project completed in 44 seconds. On September 4, 2021, Italian pilot Dario Costa attempted to fly his race plane at 303,8kph through Turkey’s dual Çatalca Tunnels.

programme.title: A mind-bending dance performance
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 A mind-bending dance performance
programme.desc: Join us on a mind-bending journey with Dassy, Angyil, and Kyoka, three Red Bull dancers who are performing their outstanding choreographies in the stunning Tricklandia in Slovakia, a location filled with trick rooms and optical illusions.

programme.title: Cross-country highlights – Mairiporã
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from the first stop of the 2024 UCI Mountain Bike World Cup season as the cross-country athletes start the season off in Mairiporã, Brazil.

programme.title: Cross-country highlights – Araxá
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from Stop 2 of the 2024 UCI MTB World Cup season with all the cross-country action from Araxá, Minas Gerais in Brazil.

programme.title: Downhill highlights – Fort William
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Downhill highlights – Fort William
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from the third stop of the 2024 World Cup season with all the downhill action from Fort William, Scotland, UK.

programme.title: Highlights – Bielsko-Biala
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from the third stop of the 2024 World Cup season with all the downhill and enduro action from Bielsko-Biała, Poland.

programme.title: Cross-country highlights – Nové Město
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cross-country highlights – Nové Město
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from the fourth stop of the 2024 World Cup season with all the cross-country action from Nové Město na Moravě, Czech Republic.

programme.title: Downhill highlights – Leogang
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from the fifth stop of the 2024 UCI Mountain Bike World Cup 2024 season with all the downhill action from Saalfelden Leogang, Austria.

programme.title: XCO and DH highlights – Val di Sole
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 XCO and DH highlights – Val di Sole
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from the sixth stop of the 2024 World Cup season with all the cross-country and downhill action from Val di Sole, Trentino, Italy.

programme.title: Cross-country highlights – Crans-Montana
programme.desc: Watch the highlights from the seventh stop of the 2024 World Cup season with all the cross-country action from Crans-Montana, Valais, Switzerland.

programme.title: Highlight Show Rampage 2023
programme.desc: The best freeride mountain bikers compete on the most exposed terrain on earth. Follow along by watching this one hour highlight show of the Rampage 2023 competition.

programme.title: Crankworx Whistler: Red Bull Joyride highlights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Crankworx Whistler: Red Bull Joyride highlights
programme.desc: The world's best MTB riders interpret the custom-built course in Whistler for a slopestyle showdown at Red Bull Joyride. Watch Dawid Godziek claim the Triple Crown and Alma Wiggberg make her mark.

programme.title: Red Bull Hardline
programme.desc: Red Bull Hardline UK returns for the 10th time, bigger and harder than ever. The world’s toughest and most progressive downhill mountain bike race isn’t for the faint-hearted.

programme.title: Red Bull Erzbergrodeo recap
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Erzbergrodeo recap
programme.desc: Red Bull KTM Factory Racing’s Manuel Lettenbichler put on a masterclass in Austria, claiming a comfortable win over FMF KTM Factory Racing’s Trystan Hart and Sherco Factory Racing’s Mario Roman.

programme.title: Red Bull Valparaíso Cerro Abajo
programme.desc: The world's largest urban downhill race is turning 20! The best riders from across the globe will join us in an epic and insane celebration at Red Bull Valparaíso Cerro Abajo.

programme.title: Beyond the Line
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 The MTB World Cup season is back with a bang!
programme.desc: Rob Warner, Eliot Jackson and Emily Batty discuss Martin Vidaurre's performance in Brazil, plus Vali Höll on team changes, Warner on skin suits, Nino Schurter and Kate Courtney on Paris qualifying.

programme.title: Beyond the Line
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 How to build the perfect mountain bike team
programme.desc: Rob Warner and Eliot Jackson talk with industry pros on building the ultimate DH team, cyclist Jackson Goldstone shares his recovery from injury, and XCO’s Emily Batty explores new training methods.

programme.desc: Dieses Turnier ist größer als je zuvor, die besten Spieler der Welt kommen vom 5. bis 10. September nach 'Manhattan an der Maas'. Ein 'königliches' Stadion direkt im Stadtzentrum am Henegouwerplein ist der Schauplatz und Nebenplätze in den Vororten umrahmen dieses Ereignis.

programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 33

programme.title: FAI World Air Games - Teil 1
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games, is the premier international multi-discipline air sports event fielding the world’s top athletes. The 2015 edition of the FAI World Air Games has been awarded for the first time to Dubai.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Heroes
programme.desc: The best riders at the best mountains - that´s the Freeride World Tour! We´re going to introduce some of the key players of the tour, from experienced veterans to hungry rookies.

programme.title: Loic and the Flolopapys
programme.desc: Loic, Pierre,Pabloand Florian are climbers. Together they form the inseparable “Flolopapys” but can Loic use the Flolopapys energy to overcome his haunting fear of heights as he confronts some of the toughest climbs on the planet?

programme.title: World E-Bike Series 2022 Round 3 & 4
programme.desc: In todays Episode we´re traveling to France & Belgium for round 3 & 4 of the World E-Bike Series. The World’s best male & female mountain bikers are going to battle out who will take the lead in the middle of the racing calendar.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series 2022 - Schaan (LIE)
programme.desc: On September 11th, the world’s best long jumpers and pole vaulters took once again flight on a certified mobile athletics facility that enables the athletes to use the same runway.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships (KZ/KZ2)
programme.desc: The first of the two world championship events of the 2022 FIA Karting season offers a very attractive programme with five categories and more than 320 drivers taking part in Le Mans (FRA) from 1st to 4th September.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series 2022 Round 5 & 6
programme.desc: A long and exciting World E-Bike Series season enters its final two rounds in Girona and Barcelona. Who will be crowned the winner of the series this year? Let´s check out!

programme.title: Episode 33
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2024 - Episode 33

programme.title: Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine 2023
programme.desc: Der VANORA ENGADINWIND by Dakine kehrt 2023 mit viel spannender Windsurf-Action auf dem Silvaplanasee in der Schweiz zurück. Der ENGADINWIND ist auch Gastgeber der ersten iQ FOiL U21 Weltmeisterschaft, die für das olympische Programm in Paris 2024 ausgewählt wurde.

programme.title: WES E-Bike World Series #5 & World Rookie Tour Finals
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode machen wir einen Städtetrip: Zuerst schauen wir bei der WES E-Bike World Series in Bielstein, Deutschland, vorbei und dann geht's weiter zum Finale der World Rookie Tour und ihren jungen Skatetalente in Innbruck.

programme.title: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour The Stars of Freestyle
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werden wir die GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023 besuchen. Die Hälfte der Kitesurfing-Freestyle-Saison ist bereits vorbei und das ist ein guter Grund, die vergangenen Events und den aktuellen Stand der Athleten zu analysieren.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH

programme.title: Hot Ones
